returns.tokenOutput: Amount of tokens received from the swap

params.tokens: Amount of tokens to be transferred to the DEX

returns._0: totalLiquidity The total liquidity provided to the DEX

params.xReserves: Current x reserves in the DEX
params.yReserves: Current y reserves in the DEX

returns.yOutput: Amount of y to be output

params.tokenInput: Amount of tokens to be swapped

returns.ethOutput: Amount of ETH received from the swap

LiquidityProvided(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Emitted when liquidity provided to DEX and mints LPTs.

LiquidityRemoved(address,uint256,uint256.notice: Emitted when liquidity removed from DEX and decreases LPT count within DEX.

deposit().notice: Allows users to deposit ETH and tokens into the liquidity pool

getLiquidity(address).notice: Returns the liquidity of a given user

init(uint256).notice: Initializes the DEX with ETH and token reserves

price(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Calculates the output amount of y for a given input amount of x

withdraw(uint256).notice: Allows users to withdraw ETH and tokens from the liquidity pool

userdoc.notice: A simple decentralized exchange for ETH and ERC20 tokens
